resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description:
- Working in a team and delivering banking software from scratch.
- Focused on front-end development, providing mentorship and coaching to 2 or 3 interns each summer
- Creating reusable components and high scaling applications with tests coverage of at least 80%.
For that purpose, I have used the 'Ant' design and material design and only functional components.

work.title: Mid/Senior Frontend Engineer
work.description:
- Developed several technologies with React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, Nuxt.js and other frameworks to assist Fortune 500 companies with increasing their productivity by 40% or more
- Drafted documentation delineating designs and specs for more than 20 projects
- Teamed up with current clients to understand needs for improved functionality, and communicated with engineers and clients to develop enhancements that boosted client satisfaction by 27%
- Transformed UIs using React, decreasing debugging time by 62% and increasing views by 31%

work.title: Software Trainer
work.description:
- Learned many different programming languages
- Base expertise such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Java, PHP, Laravel, Android/IOS, Mobile, Web, Game development, and so on
- Studied data structures to recommend changes in algorithms, which boosted online sales by 6%
- Partnered with interns, using code composition to redesign a clean API that offered increased flexibility to third parties, which generated a revenue increase of $1.5M
